#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long int test;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        long int n,i;
        cin>>n;
        long long int a[n+5],t;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
        }
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            if(i%2==0)
            {
                if(a[i]>a[i+1])
                {
                    t=a[i];
                    a[i]=a[i+1];
                    a[i+1]=t;
                }
            }
            else if(a[i]<a[i+1])
            {
                t=a[i];
                a[i]=a[i+1];
                a[i+1]=t;
            }
        }
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cout<<a[i]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
